titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to prohibit retroactive taxation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits Congress from retroactively increasing the rate of a tax or imposing a new tax, except under a presidential declaration of a national emergency.
